issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
When testing KitchenSink Base UI>Views>Coverflow view>Coverflow Local Files and rotating to landscape, the view navigation arrows get compressed (see  attached image)

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.7.0 on iPhone 4 with SDK 1.7.X
2) Navigate to UI>Views>Coverflow view>Coverflow Local Files
3) Rotate the device to landscape

Result:
View navigation arrows are not attractive

Expected Result:
Well-formed arrows

Notes:
Could not verify in 1.6.2 because the KS test did not allow orientation change.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink Base UI>Views>Coverflow view>Coverflow Local Files, arrow graphics in landscape view get compressed
fields.environment: Verizon iPhone 4 (4.2.8) , Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.0.201105271818, Titanium SDK version: 1.7.X r5aa431bc

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
